original_text: For who shall have pity upon thee, O Jerusalem? or who shall bemoan thee? or who shall go aside to ask how thou doest?
korean_text: 예루살렘아 너를 불쌍히 여길 자 누구며 너를 위해 울 자 누구며 돌이켜 네 평안을 물을 자 누구냐

sentences.original_text: For who shall have pity upon thee

sentences.korean_translation: 또 너를 위하여 슬퍼하는 자가 누구며

sentences.original_text: or who shall go aside to ask
